Class Simulate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.cli.commands.Simulate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    @AutoService(value=Command.class)
public class Simulate
extends Object
implements Command

    Simulates a recommender algorithm over time.
